original_text: You must not punish fathers with death for the sins that their children do. You must not punish children with death for the sins that their fathers do. Each person must die only because of his own sins.
korean_text: 아버지는 그 자식들로 말미암아 죽임을 당하지 않을 것이요 자식들은 그 아버지로 말미암아 죽임을 당하지 않을 것이니 각 사람은 자기 죄로 말미암아 죽임을 당할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: You must not punish fathers with death
for the sins that their children do
You must not punish children with death
for the sins that their fathers do
Each person must die only because of his own sins
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자신의 죄 때문에만 죽어야 합니다
